page.title: 14ASHBY TRAFFIC PROBLEM
page.content: Ashby de la Zouch has a major traffic problem,because two main roads_A453 & A50_converge in the town. A traffic survey was carried out in 1981,the results were as follows_ A453 from the south_8122vehicles per day from the north_9240vehicles per day A50 from the south_east _7023 vehicles per day from the north_west _7177 vehicles per day A new road is proposed to replace the A453.It will be called the A42,and will be an extension of the M42 joining Applby Magna with the M1 at Kegworth. There are no plans as yet to build a by_pass to replace the A50.
